name: Beatemvania
description:
Welcome to te Beatemvania prototype! I'm developing this prototype in my free time.

With this prototype I'm trying to achieve 2D sprites affected by 3D lights in a 3D world and trying to mix both worlds. My idea is to do all the characters in 2D while the enviroment is in 3D.

The demo is just 1 level with some basic mechanics and 5 different enemies. If you wanna try it I would appreciate any kind of feedback so I can keep developing it and make sure I'm in the right direction.

All the sprites found in the demo are from itch.io and I don't own them in any way, shape or form, this is just a prototype to test the idea, so thank you to all the awesome artists of itch.io that publish those masterpieces for free! Big thanks :)

You can use mouse/keyboard or any type of controller to play.

Follow me on Instagram @onetradegames to see almost daily updates.

Thank you for your time!
